overview: This stylish crime thriller starring Gibrán González and Rojo Grau dramatizes the dangerous Mexican underworld, where drug deals, extortion and violence are everyday events and treachery and corruption are standard operating procedure. Ignacio Rinza's gripping drama explores how far some people will go to get by when there's nowhere else to turn for help. Víctor Ortíz and Carlos Samperio co-star.
title: Perra Sociedad
